CardData.FlavorText: Another roar bellows close by. The thought of dealing with yet another of Mirkwood’s great bruins brings you near despair. Dumbfounded, you witness the new arrival trample past you to gore one of your enemies with its fearful maw. As you’ve seen this shade of fur before, you realize that Grimbeorn, the chieftain of the Beornings, has come to do battle with Kirus, enemy of the true wild.
